job.title: Software Engineer.
job.description: ethicon part of johnson ampamp johnson medical devices companies is recruiting for a software engineer located in redwood city caltbrgtltbrgtjohnson ampamp johnson medical devices is passionate about crafting the future of digital surgery and expanding its robotics and digital solutions offerings across the entire portfolio with multispecialty endtoend solutions in orthopedics endoluminal intervention and general surgery this includes the monarch platform a firstofitskind robotic technology indicated for bronchoscopic visualization of and access to patient airways for diagnostic and therapeutic procedures in the lungltbrgtltbrgtethicon part of johnson ampamp johnson medical devices companies has made significant contributions to surgery for more than years from crafting the first sutures to revolutionizing surgery with minimally invasive procedures our continuing dedication to shape the future of surgery is built on our commitment to help address the worlds most pressing health care issues and improve and save more lives through ethicons surgical technologies and solutions including sutures staplers energy devices trocars and hemostats and our commitment to treat serious medical conditions like obesity worldwide we deliver innovation to make a lifechanging impact for more information visit wwwethiconcomltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtposition overviewltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjohnson ampamp johnson robotics ampamp digital solutions is looking for software engineer for calibration tools to join a team of hardworking roboticists and software engineers who are trying to solve some of the hardest problems in medicine todayltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for an engineer to work on our growing ecosystem of engineering and production tools that will enable new generations of platform capability the right candidate should be an experienced software developer who enjoys working on tools and infrastructure good command of python and c are required as well as strong communication and presentation skills you will have an opportunity to lead projects from concept to release engage engineers from other teams to learn what they need and build amazing tools to make them more efficient and effective in their daytoday work your work will enable the team to design build and service nextgeneration of medical device technology fasterltbrgtltbrgtjohnson ampamp johnson is an affirmative action and equal opportunity employer all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity age national origin or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disabilityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtrequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtqualificationsltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtbachelors degree in computer science or a related degreeltligt ltligtbachelors degree with years of software development experience or masters degree with years of software development experienceltligt ltligtexperience building data access and visualization toolsltligt
